faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to the most common questions about our Image to Video AI.
faq.cta_title: Ready to Experience the Future of Video Creation?

0.question: What is image to video AI and how does it work?
0.answer: Image to video AI is an advanced artificial intelligence technology that analyzes static images and transforms them into dynamic videos. Our AI uses deep learning algorithms to understand the content of your image and generate realistic motion, creating smooth video transitions that bring your photos to life.

1.question: Is your image to video AI free to use?
1.answer: Yes, we offer free trials for new users to experience our image to video AI technology. This allows you to test the capabilities of our AI video generator before deciding to use more advanced features.

2.question: What image formats work best with your image to video AI?
2.answer: Our image to video AI supports all common formats including JPG, PNG and WebP. For optimal results, we recommend high-resolution images with clear subjects.

3.question: How long does the image to video AI generation take?
3.answer: Our AI typically generates videos within 2-5 minutes, depending on the complexity of your image and the current server load. We provide real-time progress updates during the generation process.

4.question: Can I use the generated videos for commercial purposes?
4.answer: Absolutely! You retain full ownership and commercial rights to all videos generated by our image to video AI. You can use these videos for marketing, social media, or any other purpose.
